SELECT r.reviewer, r.reviewee, r.rv_content, m.member_pic, p.product_title, r.rv_score, p.product_num, p.product_pic, t.type_div, m.member_nickname FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.reviewee = m.member_id JOIN trade t ON r.prod_num = t.prod_num JOIN product p ON r.prod_num = p.product_num AND p.product_seller = t.sell_mem_id WHERE r.reviewee = #{id};
